title: DNS Services docs
introduction: IBM Cloud DNS Services provides private DNS to Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) users.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with DNS Services
section_recommended.description: Instructions for setting up a DNS Services instance.

section_recommended.title: About DNS Services
section_recommended.description: Learn about DNS in general, and see a DNS Services overview.

section_recommended.title: DNS Services pricing
section_recommended.description: See the pricing for DNS Services features.

tiles.title: Beta release of Custom resolvers, add import and export for DNS records, add Sao Paulo region support.
tiles.description: Adding support for the Sau Paulo region, including import and export commands for DNS records, and the beta release of Custom resolvers.

tiles.title: Add service clock synchronization information
tiles.description: Information about synchronizing the service clock has been added.

tiles.title: Add Osaka region
tiles.description: Added the Osaka region to list of available DNS Services resolver regions.
